reviewText: Hidden in this wonder of vintage military training film is sound advice for anyone who owns and shoots the M1 Garand.  Tips on position, trigger control, sight alignment, sight adjustment.  Good stuff for sure.

Was not able to review this product as it would not work. My player gave an error message as :Disc error. Playback feature may not be available on this disc. I have just contacted the seller to resolve this problem.
